thread.title: James Taylor's mother dies at Martha's Vineyard home at 92
thread.title_full: James Taylor's mother dies at Martha's Vineyard home at 92

title: James Taylor's mother dies at Martha's Vineyard home at 92
text:
Scott Roth James Taylor's mother dies at Martha's Vineyard home at 92 
FILE - In this Jan. 20, 2015 file photo, James Taylor performs at the Nearness of You concert at Jazz at Lincoln Center in New York. Taylor posted on his website that his mother, Gertrude Woodard Taylor, died over the weekend on Martha's Vineyard. She was 92. (Photo by Scott Roth/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 1:08 pm | Updated: 4:01 pm, Mon Oct 12, 2015. James Taylor's mother dies at Martha's Vineyard home at 92 Associated Press | 
CHILMARK, Mass. (AP) — The mother of Grammy Award-winning singer-songwriter James Taylor has died at age 92. 
Gertrude Woodard Taylor died over the weekend surrounded by four generations of family at her home "overlooking her beloved Stonewall Pond" in Chilmark on Martha's Vineyard, the "Fire & Rain" singer said on his website.
